/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth and complexity to the image. Cars and people can be seen going about their day, contributing to the dynamic atmosphere of the city. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's energy and vibrancy.
